title: Le temps des vacances !
resume: Simone and Marie-Philippe turn their terrace into a place for parties and stimulating conversation with guests. Collaborators and friends drop by to give them tips based on their personal experience, lend a hand on a DIY project, serve as guinea pigs for one of Simone’s recipes, or act as sidekicks for one of Marie-Philippe’s crazy ideas.
